cause.description:
Our goal is too make sure all the animals get into a loving enviroment and make sure that they are well taken care of until they find the right home.
1. Every animal should have a loving family
2. No aminal should be out on the streets alone
3. Animals deserve a good life
cause.mission: our mission is too make sure all pets have a loving and caring home
cause.name: S.P.C.A
